name: com.yohash.fabrik
description: Implementation of Forward and Backward Reaching Inverse Kinematics (FABRIK), a fast IK solution

samples.description: The Custom IK scripts will perform IK by iteratively testing rotations. This sample scene shows you how to set up a basic robot limb with Custom IK
The basic FABRIK algorithm is showcased in this scene with two robotic arms of 7 segments. One arm applies constraints, while the other does not.
The Upper Torso script demonstrates how to implement hands+head IK using FABRIK. This sample scene shows you how to set up a floating upper torso.

The Lower body script demonstrates how to implement leg IK using FABRIK. The lower torso will match the model's waist at a provided position, and raycast to the ground to position feet. Combine with Upper Body FABRIK for a whole body!
This scene uses physical joints and PID controllers to move the FABRIK arm.
